did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Archives Union File (AUF), Section 3: Boxes 127-191
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: The Archives Union File is a collection of publications of United States labor unions. Included is information on the American Institute for Free Labor Development. The AUF collection consists largely of pamphlets and publications of unions, collected by the Kheel Center.
did.langmaterial: Collection material in English, Chinese, French, German, Italian, Japanese, Polish, Spanish, Yiddish

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Due to the volume of material in this collection the finding aid has been divided into twelve sections.
Boxes 650-659 and 661-662 have not been inventoried at this time.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.
